title: Team Qatar (2009) TVRIP BBC4 Tribeca
description:
In preparation for the world championship in DC, the first Qatari national debate team train in Doha, London, and New York.

Guided by the 22 year-old former president of the Oxford Union, they direct their immense curiosity and ambition towards mastering the arcane strategies of British parliamentary debate. They are determined to show they are not closed-minded extremists ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ and even more determined to win. Quirky and endearing, entertaining and informative, the film offers an entertaining window onto the rapidly growing global culture of the Arab world and its relation to the West.
